mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, real_name AS realName, email, phone, avatar_url AS avatarUrl, status, is_admin AS isAdmin, last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}

SELECT id, username, password, real_name AS realName, email, phone, avatar_url AS avatarUrl, status, is_admin AS isAdmin, last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_code FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 1
SELECT r.role_code AS roleCode, r.role_name AS roleName FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY r.id

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.permission_code
